item.title: How this website was built (with Hugo and github)
item.description: Websites usually do not have a ‘how it was built’ page. But for this one, I felt compelled to have one. The content is of course mine, but I would not have been able to build this without many free tools, software and guidance. And I am convinced that when taking stuff from a community, one should also use best efforts to contribute. So here is my, very humble, contribution.
